DOC.detailed_description: Coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery perform worldwide . Several study find decrease pulmonary function , loss thoracic mobility high prevalence chronic poststernotomy pain ( CPSP ) CABG . So far effective treatment condition . The OstinCare study aim investigate whether osteopathic treatment add value treatment patient .
